DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the impact of bystander CPR, prehospital resuscitation protocols, and hospital post-resuscitation protocols for out-of-hospital cardiac arrest patients in the state of Arizona.
DOC.brief_title: Save Hearts in Arizona Registry and Education (SHARE) Project
DOC.criteria: Out of Hospital Cardiac Arrest (loss of spontaneous circulation and EMS attempted resuscitation) Do Not Resuscitate
